sourcesContent:
About
I am a Research Intern at Lab2Market , focused on improving software quality assurance through data analysis and collaboration with experts. Simultaneously, I'm pursuing a Master's in Applied Computer Science at Dalhousie University, building expertise in software development and cloud computing. Prior to this, I worked as a Senior Product Engineer at Tata Consultancy Services, where I specialized in model-driven engineering and contributed significantly to project success. I worked extensively on a low coding platform for non-technical stakeholders to bring thier ideas to life.
